overview: 9/11: It was a PR stunt which killed thousands and launched a propaganda war that has, so far, lasted a decade. Since then, the US and al-Qaeda have competed furiously to win “hearts and minds” with elaborate media strategies. Spin, threats, lies, censorship, the killing of journalists; how far has each side been prepared to go to win the propaganda war?
tagline: The US and al-Qaeda tried spin, threats, lies and censorship to win the propaganda war, but did anyone succeed?
title: The 9/11 Decade: The Image War
